title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
description: When setting an alias for a column in a dataset, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: The Expression Builder displays the old column names when selecting the dataset, even though aliases have been set for the columns.
EB: The Expression Builder should display the updated alias names when selecting the dataset, reflecting the changes made to the column names.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the Expression Builder.
5. Select the dataset.

Expected result: The Expression Builder should display the updated alias names.

Actual result: The Expression Builder displays the old column names.
